sub_title: Environmental Engineer  | Health & Safety Professional | Project Management
summary:
Environmental engineer and Health & Safety Specialist. Throughout my professional career, I have developed a deep understanding of the importance of maintaining a safe and healthy work environment. With over three years of experience working in analysing environmental impact of new construction projects I have developed a strong understanding of the complex factors that contribute to environmental degradation. I am proud to have been involved in the Payments for Environmental Services (PES) program in Colombia, which provided financial incentives to landowners who implemented sustainable land use practices.

In addition to my environmental expertise, I have a strong  knowledge in safety assessments and identifying and mitigating workplace hazards. I have developed a keen eye for potential safety issues and know how to take proactive steps to prevent accidents and injuries. I am committed to promoting a culture of safety in every workplace I am involved in.

I am proficient in using GIS and other environmental monitoring tools to collect and analyze spatial data for environmental impact assessments, as well as managing environmental monitoring and reporting.  I am passionate about environmental sustainability and committed to identifying and mitigating environmental and occupational health risks in the workplace.
